title: FIFA World Cup : Number of goals scored at each tournament 1930 to 2018
summary: This is a bar chart representing Countries in the x axis and Number of goals scored in the y axis.
Countries Brazil 2014 has the highest Number of goals scored and Italy 1934 has the lowest Number of goals scored.
There is a difference of 101.0 between the maximum Countries Brazil 2014 and minimum Countries Italy 1934.
min_summary: This bar chart has 21 columns on the x axis representing Countries, and Number of goals scored in each Countries on the y axis.
The Number of goals scored is highest at Countries Brazil 2014 and lowest at Countries Italy 1934.
